actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to extend commissary and exchange privileges to certain widows of deceased veterans and to certain disabled veterans.

summary.text: Extends commissary and exchange privileges to widows, veterans who died from a service connected disability rated as permanently and totally disabling and to disabled veterans with a 50 percent or more service-connected disability.

titles.title: A bill to extend commissary and exchange privileges to certain widows of deceased veterans and to certain disabled veterans.
